name: Query By Committee
description: Query by Committee (QBC) takes inspiration from ensemble methods. Instead of just one classifier, it takes into account the decision of a committee C=ℎ1,…,ℎc of classifiers ℎi. Each classifier has the same target classes, but a different underlying model or a different view on the data.
x_kb_article:
